channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
How can you make a server like ::food or ::pots non-admin? what i mean is how can i make it player usable?
also, how can i create a ::pure or ::master command to set levels?
what do i type? where do i put it commands.java?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @str_o_tek str o tek
item.description:
@str_o_tek wrote:

[quote=“surreality, post:1, topic:333451”]How can you make a server like ::food or ::pots non-admin? what i mean is how can i make it player usable?

also, how can i create a ::pure or ::master command to set levels?

what do i type? where do i put it commands.java?[/quote]
Oh my god you’re the greates nub ive seen around here -.- (no offence)
search for command.startswith
and u see a bunch of stuff, including a if (command.startswith(“sumtin”){ and so on.
over that if, copy in the code:

if(command.startsWith(“food”)){
addItem(Item ID, how many);// you can always copy in more addItems as long as its inside the same {-} (command).
}
if want like a ::pure, it could be:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(2000000, 0);//sets level for skill number 0 addSkillXP(2000000, 2);//sets level for skill number 2 addSkillXP(2000000, 3);//sets level for skill number 3 addSkillXP(2000000, 4);//sets level for skill number 4 addSkillXP(2000000, 6);//sets level for skill number 6 }

Read full topic
